rules.name: In the Lion's Claws
rules.lore: Those unfortunate enough to be caught between the devastating speed of the Ravenwing and the adamantine might of the Deathwing are pinned in place and torn to shreds by their combined fury
rules.text: Enemy units (excluding +Monster+ and +Vehicle+ units) cannot make Fall Back movements, except by using the [Desperate Breakout](/rules/strategems#desperate_breakout) strategem.

spells.name: Mind Worm
spells.effect: Select an enemy unit within 18". It suffers 1 mortal damage. If it has not yet been Activated yet this Battle-Round, it must be activated last this Battle-Round. If it has already been Activated this Battle-Round, it must be Activated last during the next Battle-Round instead.

spells.name: Engulfing Fear
spells.effect: Until the end of the Battle-round, enemy units within 18" must take Battle-Shock and Leadership tests by rolling three dice and discarding the highest roll. At the beginning of the next Battle-Round, enemy units within 18" must take Battle-Shock tests the same way.

spells.name: Aversion
spells.effect: Select one enemy unit within 24". Until the end of the Battle Round, it has -1 to all Hit rolls.

strategems.name: Knights of Iron
strategems.effect: The Activated unit can move horizontally through terrain features when making a Normal, Advance, or Charge movement.

strategems.name: Inescapable Wrath
strategems.when: After all of your units have Activated for the Battle-Round. If your opponent has units remaining to Activate, this Strategem must be invoked after any of those units' Activations has been completed.
strategems.target: A friendly +Deathwing Infantry+ or +Deathwing Walker+ unit.
strategems.effect: Activate that unit. It may perform Charge and Fight actions.
